item.description:
Practice Portuguese while listening to Brazilian music.

Come see Receita de Samba, husband and wife team (Bill and Anna) perform at Ryles.
Tonight will be a special night: they will be accompanied by other musicians (percusionist, flutist, and others).
They will perform Brazilian Samba, Bossa Nova, and some Chorinho.

There is a cover charge of $10.

To listen to a music sample, follow this

link to their profile (Receita de Samba) at www.myspace.com .



Also, Receita de Samba typically play every Saturday from 8pm - midnight at Sunset Cafe, in Cambridge.
item.how_to_find_us: Sign at the door and table

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian Samba Music (Receita de Samba) at Ryles
